Installation¶

KoNLPy is not registered in PyPI yet. Please install from source until further notice.

Requirements¶

  • Linux
  • Python 2.x
  • JRE 1.7

Install KoNLPy¶

$ pip install git+https://github.com/e9t/konlpy.git

or

$ git clone git@github.com:e9t/konlpy.git
$ cd konlpy
$ python setup.py install

Optional installations¶

In order to use the MeCab morpheme analyzer, install the followings:

  • mecab-ko, mecab-ko-dic
  • mecab-python
